item.title: composer
item.description: composer require “mk-j/php_xlsxwriter” –no-update 版本说明 “require”: { “vendor/package”: “1.3.2”, // exactly 1.3.2 // >, <, >=, <= | specify upper / lower bounds "vendor/package": ">=1.3.2", // anything above or equal to 1.3.2 "vendor/package": "<1.3.2", // anything below 1.3.2 // * | wildcard "vendor/package": "1.3.*", // >=1.3.0 <1.4.0 // ~ | allows last digit specified to go up "vendor/package": "~1.3.2", // >=1.3.2 <1.4.0 "vendor/package": "~1.3", // >=1.3.0 <2.0.0
